# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection and enhance your experience. Given its quality and features, I am offering it to you for $110. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, considering your appreciation for high-quality items. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
